name: hello-node
description: A simple Node app built on fastify, instantly up and running.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib && eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib)
scripts.start: which bash ; ls -lah /bin/sh ; chmod a+x ./install.sh ; ./install.sh ; eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib) ; perl simple_echo_server.pl || node server.js ;
